author: hustla187
title: Technic at its Best
review: The first few years for Lego Technic were just amazing. Lego put so much detail in to these and actually look better than today's Technic. The engine and the wheels are very cool and so is the smoke stack. 5 out of 5 for a great Technic set.

author: Amusedmaj
title: Awesome early Technic set
review:
I remember seeing this set in the toy store for the first time back in the early 1980's.  I just had to have it.  I grew up on a farm and it reminded me of one of the tractors that we had.  I received it from my Grandmother on my 7th birthday and I remember just being completely blown away by it. 

It has many cool features.  The 3 point hitch, PTO and the steering are really cool.  There are also plenty of extra parts included in the set to build several other pieces of equipment that you can "hook up" to the tractor.  All in all, pretty neat stuff.

Of course, it may be considered pretty primitive compared to today's Technic sets, but back in the early 1980's it was one of the sets to have.  I am glad that I still have this set and that it's still fully intact.  It is definitely worth having in any LEGO collection if you can find it.
